General.Name: De Poan Pneumatic
General.Description: De Poan Pneumatic Corp. manufactures and sells professional pneumatic tools worldwide. The company offers nailer products, including industrial and framing coil, cordless, framing, roofing, finishing, palm, and brad nailers; and construction staplers, cap tools, and pinners. It also provides air tools such as composite and aluminum wrench, sander, and air saw. The company was founded in 1983 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 81, Museum Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24947
